original:
Introduction (approx. 100 words)
Company management plays a pivotal role in driving organizational success. The fundamental principles that underpin effective management practices not only influence the overall performance of a company but also shape a favorable work environment. This essay will discuss the key principles of company management and analyze their impact on organizational success. Fu
